author: eawosika
content:
Hi all. I Published an in-depth explainer on EIP-7251 for those interested in learning more about the proposal to increase `MAX_EFFECTIVE_BALANCE` from 32 ETH to 2048 ETH and implement in-protocol validator consolidation as a solution to the problem of contracting the Beacon Chain's validator set: https://ethereum2077.substack.com/p/eip-7251-increase-max-effective-balance. 

The article explains how EIP-7251 modifies aspects of the consensus protocol like validator activation, deposits, withdrawals, and slashing penalties to enable validator consolidation while preserving the Beacon Chainâ€™s existing security properties. It also addresses issues regarding increased slashing risk for large validators and (potential) regulatory issues arising from implementing EIP-7251's auto-compounding rewards feature. 

All comments/feedback are welcome.
